    • Uses of Actor in game.actions

      Methods in game.actions with parameters of type Actor 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String AimAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Actor needs concentration to be aim target, if actor performs other action or get hurt, they will lose their concentration.
      java.lang.String AttackAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)  
      java.lang.String CraftingAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Craft Weapons if it is an arm, craft it into a ZombieClub if it is a leg, craft it into a ZombieMace
      java.lang.String EatAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Allow the Actor who perform this Action to recover health points and the food to be removed from inventory for Player and from the location of Actor for Human and Farmer, looking as though Actor eat food to heal the damage.
      java.lang.String FertilizeAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Speed up the age of the unripe Crop by calling the overridden method speedUpAge().
      java.lang.String FireRangedWeaponAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Display the submenu for the chosen ranged weapon if it is loaded with ammunition and fulfil the criteria to be fired if there is any.
      java.lang.String FireShotgunAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Allow the shotgun to hurt the target within its area of effect based on the direction chosen by the Player and return description of the firing action of the shotgun.
      java.lang.String FireSniperRifleAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Depending on the actor and the target's AimCapablity, actor will have 2 possible options after choosing to fire sniper rifle First possible option is AimAction Second possible option is ShootAction if target has not been aimed before, they can be aimed or shoot If target is aimied for the first time, they can be aimed or shoot if target is aimed for the second time, they can be shoot only
      java.lang.String HarvestAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Allow the Actor to harvest a ripe crop and drop a Food on harvestLocation for Farmer and add the Food into the inventory for Player.
      java.lang.String QuitGameAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Allow the Player to quit the game by removing the Player from the map and return a string of description indicating that Player quits the game.
      java.lang.String ShootAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      If target is aim for one round, damage dealt will be double if target is aim for second round, it will be kill instantly Provided that actor has concentration.
      java.lang.String SowAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Set the ground of sowLocation to be a Crop.
      java.lang.String SummonZombieAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Zombies are summoned randomly all over the map The names of the zombies are generated randomly.
      java.lang.String VanishAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Remove actor from the map and add ZombieCapability.VANISH to the actor
      java.lang.String ZombieAttackAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Attacks the target Zombie has higher missing rate for bite attack than punch attack if the Zombie lands a bite attack, it heals for 5 hitpoints
      java.lang.String AimAction.menuDescription​(Actor actor)
      Return a string of description on this action for display.
      java.lang.String AttackAction.menuDescription​(Actor actor)  
      java.lang.String CraftingAction.menuDescription​(Actor actor)
      Return a string of description on this action for display.
      java.lang.String EatAction.menuDescription​(Actor actor)
      Return a string of description on this action for display.
      java.lang.String FertilizeAction.menuDescription​(Actor actor)
      Return a string of description on this action for display.
      java.lang.String FireRangedWeaponAction.menuDescription​(Actor actor)
      Return a string of description on this action for display and for the Player to choose the ranged weapon to be fired.
      java.lang.String FireShotgunAction.menuDescription​(Actor actor)
      Return a string of description on this action for display and for the Player to choose based on the direction.
      java.lang.String FireSniperRifleAction.menuDescription​(Actor actor)
      Return a string of description on this action for display.
      java.lang.String HarvestAction.menuDescription​(Actor actor)
      Return a string of description on this action for display.
      java.lang.String QuitGameAction.menuDescription​(Actor actor)
      Return a string of description on this action for display and for the Player to choose if Player decides to quit this game.
      java.lang.String ShootAction.menuDescription​(Actor actor)
      Return a string of description on this action for display.
      java.lang.String SowAction.menuDescription​(Actor actor)
      Return a string of description on this action.
      java.lang.String SummonZombieAction.menuDescription​(Actor actor)
      Return a string of description on this action for display.
      java.lang.String VanishAction.menuDescription​(Actor actor)
      Return a string of description on this action for display.

    • Uses of Actor in game.behaviours

      Methods in game.behaviours with parameters of type Actor 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Action AttackBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns a ZombieAttackAction if the actor is a Zombie that attacks an adjacent attackable Actor Returns an AttackAction that attacks an adjacent attackable Actor.
      Action ChantingBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)  
      Action EatBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns an EatAction that allows an damaged Actor who is standing on a Food to eat.
      Action FertilizeBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns a FertilizeAction that allows an Actor who is standing on an unripe Crop to fertilize it.
      Action FollowBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)  
      Action HarvestBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns a HarvestAction that allows an Actor who is standing on or next to a ripe Crop to harvest it.
      Action HuntBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)  
      Action PickUpWeaponBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns a PickUpItemAction if there is an WeaponItem on the location it's standing
      Action SowBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns a SowAction that allows an Actor whose adjacent Ground is a Dirt to have 33% probability of sowing a crop on it.
      Action WanderBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns a MoveAction to wander to a random location, if possible.
